jobDescription: Position Description  Seeking a skilled and motivated synthetic chemist to join our medicinal chemistry drug discovery team. The ideal candidate will be experienced in the design and execution of multi-step organic synthesis as well as the purification, analysis and characterization of small molecule target compounds.  Position Requirements ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:Design, synthesis, purification and characterization of small molecule lead compoundsParticipation in group, project team and departmental research meetingsProper maintenance of laboratory notebooks in accordance with company policies and practicesCompliance with safe laboratory practices and EH&S; guidelinesContributes to the writing of technical documents, patents, scientific manuscripts, etc…SUPERVISORY RESPONSIBILITIES:NoneEDUCATION/EXPERIENCE/SKILLS:Education:BS in chemistry with 2-4 years of drug discovery experience in the pharmaceutical industry, or;MS in chemistry or organic/medicinal chemistry with 0-2 years of drug discovery experience in the pharmaceutical industryExperience:Designing and executing multi-step synthesis pathwaysUse of chromatographic purification techniques (flash chromatography, preparative HPLC, etc…)Use of modern analytical techniques (NMR, LC-MS, etc…)Knowledge/Skills/Abilities:Strong organic and medicinal chemistry bench skillsEfficient use of scientific literature and chemical/scientific databasesGood interpersonal skills, flexibility and works well within a team environmentExcellent written and verbal communication skillsJOB COMPLEXITY:Works in a fast-paced/small-team environment that is growing and evolving and which requires regular reprioritization of projects while adhering to timelines and achievement of deliverables.Has an in-depth knowledge of the functional area.Exercises independent judgment in methods, techniques and evaluation of criteria for obtaining results.DISCLAIMER The preceding job description has been designed to indicate the general nature and level of work performed by employees within this classification. It is not designed to contain or be interpreted as a comprehensive inventory of all duties, responsibilities and qualifications required of employees assigned to the job.  Exelixis is located in Alameda, CA.
